message.value: @concat(pipeline().Pipeline,' pipeline is executing for use case ', string(pipeline().parameters.category))
@concat(pipeline().Pipeline,' pipeline is completed for use case ', string(pipeline().parameters.category), '. Check status from Tableau Refresh Status pipeline.')
@concat(pipeline().Pipeline,' pipeline has failed for use case ', string(pipeline().parameters.category))

activities.name: Sign In Tableau To Get Auth Token

requestBody.value: <tsRequest><credentials name="@{activity('Fetch uid from Vault').output.value}" password="@{activity('Fetch pwd from Vault').output.value}"><site contentUrl="@{activity('read parameters').output.value[0].contentUrl}"/></credentials></tsRequest>

query.value:
Select 
"'contentUrl'" AS contentUrl,
"'tableauSourceName'" AS tableauSourceName,
"'waitTime'" AS waitTime,
"'refreshType'" AS refreshType,
"'container'" AS container,
IFNULL("'isSuccessNotification'",'N') AS isSuccessNotification
from (SELECT PARAMETERS.PARAMETER_NAME,PARAMETER_VALUE,PARAMETER_GROUP_NAME,IS_SENSITIVE
FROM META_RAW.PARAMETERS 
JOIN META_RAW.PROCESS USING (PARAMETER_GROUP_ID)
WHERE PROCESS_ID = @{pipeline().parameters.process_id}
AND IS_ACTIVE = TRUE)
as A pivot ( MAX (PARAMETER_VALUE) for PARAMETER_NAME in (
'contentUrl',
'tableauSourceName',
'waitTime',
'refreshType',
'container',
'isSuccessNotification'
));

dependsOn.activity: Sign In Tableau To Get Auth Token
